Buen plan mala ejecución.
Los devs no saben llevar por buen camino el juego con las malas decisiones que toman.
Y lo único que hacen para sobrellevar el juego y mantener a los jugadores sin quejas es meter más DLCs. 

Peor battlepass de la historia de los battlepass. 
Nerfs absurdos para mantener a la gente feliz arruinando la jugabilidad. 
Comunidad bastante tóxica, tanto de survs como de killers. 
Era más divertido antes.
Игра для психически здоровых игроков (хотя после нескольких сот часов от психики остаеться одна память, особенно если играть по ночам) чем больше и дружнее компания, тем веселее!

Дякую за підтримку України в скрутну годину❤️

over the year that i've played this game, I fall more in love with it every day. It has compelling characters and interesting storylines with such open ended lore it's a great tool to take and do with it as you will! There are so many ways to view the characters and story which makes spinning the canon into your own personal take so easy. The gameplay, while simple, leaves room for so many unique interactions for the killer v survivor. The community could be better, but it's of no fault of the game itself, which is compelling, interesting, and most importanly, a ton of fun!

This game isn't perfect, but there are lot of fun experiences to be had. Just be warned, the survivors of this game will butt dance you at every turn, whether or not you're even the killer. Also, they tend to dish out a lot of salt...be prepared to be called a camper at every turn, especially if they lose in the match. Even if you let them go, even if you're spinning in circles. You're the bad guy...so just play to the point of your character if you're the killer.

This game isn't the kinda game you want to play competively, but for the horror aspect, because no matter what, something seems to always be unbalanced, but that's okay, the fun is in the experience here. I've had so many jumpscares and creepy moments from playing both the survivor and killer. Both modes are fun as well, with both being quite challenging, depending on player skill and knowledge of the game. 

This game will make you feel scared at least once. It's a horror game.

Dead by Daylight ? Si on regarde la communauté, ce jeu n'est pas equilibré.
Plus serieusement, la qualité d'une partie dépend uniquement des joueurs qui la compose: un tueur qui s'acharne sur une même personne et qui campe H24 donnera une mauvaise image du jeu. Même chose pour un survivant qui se moque des tueurs (Tbag) parce qu'ils ont un niveau trop élevé par rapport au tueur.
Parlons maintenant gameplay: Ce jeu est juste génial dans son genre: le but pour les survivants est de réparer des généraeurs et de s'enfuir tout en évitant le tueur qui lui cherchera à tous les tuer. Il est normal, au debut, de ne pas avoir ses marques, mais au fur et à mesure des parties, cela deviens de plus en plus facile de comprendre le jeu (survivant ou tueur). Le mieux reste d'y jouer entre amis, ca reste beaucoup plus fun. Et enfin, s'il vous plait, améliorer la communauté et ne soyez pas cancer: ce jeu reste sympa et le gameplay est différent pour le 1er jeu de ce genre.
---Note personelle: 18/20---

A really fun game. Either play as a nigh unstoppable killer, or team up with other player to try survive. People say that the game is fairly killer sided at the moment, but in a game where teh killer is suppose to be powerful, I feel like it is more balanced than it has been since the game started.

Отличная игра для веселья в компании. Проста в освоении. Огромным плюсом является то, что разработчики любят свое создание и, всячески, пытаются его сделать лучше с каждой обновой. Игра, которая, на протяжении последних лет движется только вперед. Единственная игра в своем жанре. Однозначно играть!

Jogo muito bom, divertido e cheio de suspense. Esse jogo conta com um Assasino, o objetivo do assasino, é matar os sobreviventes (máximo 4), e impedir que eles façam Geradores. Geradores, abrem os portões de saída, para que os sobreviventes escapam. Quando um sobrevivente é pego, ele é colocado em um gancho. Muito tempo no gancho, pode levar a morte, e você perde o jogo como sobrevivente. De assasino, você perde o jogo, se deixar, todos os sobreviventes escaparem, ou mais que a metade. Jogo muito divertido e estressante. A unica coisa que poderia ser alterada, seria alguns perks/assasinos, que estão desbalanceados e muito OP's
